Banner.Description: I have 4 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, always with a lot of curiosity to discover the best version of the code and thus being the best version of myself. Angular being main however, focusing on Java for now, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: There is 4 years as a developer, practicing and learning every day. unitary tests, performing continuous integration and covering front-end developer roles with transition to backend.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing websites, standards, suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of an economic monitoring platform for high and medium-sized investors.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add the necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform Made in Angular, Angular Material, RxJS, Sass with graphics (configurable), alarm system, and user management and configuration of general parameters.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creation of platforms with Angular, Java, Spring Boot creating reactive applications using functional programming and object orientation.
Design layout with SASS, Angular, Spring, Material, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack Developer
Description: Creation of interactive and accessible landing pages to capture users for the customer
Using 'observables' to manage API requests with RxJS.
Development of responsive platforms supporting multiple devices

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack Developer
Description: Projeto Glória is an initiative to empower women and combat gender-based violence.
